name: Secret Mission
description: This is adventure #3 in Scott Adam's text adventure series. It takes place in a nuclear power plant. You must race against time to fulfill your mission or the reactor may be doomed. You use one or two word commands to move around and manipulate objects.
alsoFor: Apple II, Atari 8-bit, BBC Micro, Browser, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, Commodore PET/CBM, Dragon 32/64, Exidy Sorcerer, FM-7, PC-88, TI-99/4A, TRS-80, TRS-80 CoCo, VIC-20, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
